data.comment: The match has started.
Roma to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
In the minute 2, In Udine a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Udinese in the half of Roma.
Udinese's Stefano Okaka is whistled for offside at Stadio Friuli.
In the minute 5, Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Roma.
Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Rosario Abisso.
Udinese will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Roma.
In the minute 11, Lorenzo Pellegrini (Roma) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rosario Abisso signals a throw-in for Roma, close to Udinese's area.
Stefano Okaka of Udinese smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
Goal kick for Roma at Stadio Friuli.
Throw-in high up the field for Roma in Udine.
In the minute 17, Roma drive upfield and Henrikh Mkhitaryan gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Udinese defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Udine.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Udinese.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Roma push forward at Stadio Friuli and Pedro gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Udinese defence.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Udinese in the half of Roma.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
Udinese drives forward and Kevin Lasagna gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 21, Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Edin Dzeko of Roma gets in a strike, but is off target.
Rosario Abisso awards Udinese a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Udinese have a goal kick.
Lorenzo Pellegrini (Roma) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
Roma attack but Davide Santon's header doesn't find the target.
Udinese have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jordan Veretout (Roma) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
In the minute 31, Rosario Abisso signals a Udinese throw-in in Roma's half.
Roberto Pereyra (Udinese) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick Roma.
In the minute 35, Jordan Veretout (Roma) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rosario Abisso signals a Roma throw-in in Udinese's half.
Roma's Henrikh Mkhitaryan is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 37, Kevin Lasagna for Udinese gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Udine.
Rosario Abisso awards Udinese a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Roma in the half of Udinese.
Ball safe as Roma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Udinese have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 43, Udinese pushes forward through Kevin Lasagna, whose finish on goal is saved.
Roberto Pereyra (Udinese) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Roma.
In the minute 45, Roma drive upfield and Jordan Veretout gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Udinese defender.
The first half has been concluded at Stadio Friuli.
The second-half is underway in Udine.
In the minute 47, Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Roma.
Pedro (Roma) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Udinese at Stadio Friuli.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Roma's half?
In Udine a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Udinese.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
Throw-in for Roma at Stadio Friuli.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Roma in the half of Udinese.
Roma take a 0-1 lead thanks to Pedro.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Rosario Abisso.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Udinese in their own half.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
In Udine a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 59, Gianluca Mancini's header is off-target for Roma.
Udinese have a goal kick.
Roma are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 62, In Udine, Udinese push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
The home team have replaced Hidde Ter Avest with Nahuel Molina. This is the first substitution made today by Luca Gotti.
Luca Gotti (Udinese) is making a second substitution, with Fernando Forestieri replacing Tolgay Arslan.
In the minute 68, Udinese are whistled for offside.
Udinese to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
Udinese are coming forward and Stefano Okaka gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 69, Rosario Abisso awards Roma a goal kick.
In Udine Udinese attack through Thomas Ouwejan. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
In the minute 71, Roma make their first substitution with Carles Perez replacing Henrikh Mkhitaryan.
Roma needs to be cautious. Udinese have an attacking throw-in.
Udinese's Nahuel Molina gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Friuli. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Udinese.
Udinese are pushing forward but Fernando Forestieri's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Roma at Stadio Friuli.
In the minute 73, Free kick Roma.
Can Udinese capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Roma's half?
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Udinese.
In the minute 77, Rosario Abisso awards the away team a throw-in.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stefano Okaka is booked for the home team.
In the minute 79, The match at Stadio Friuli has been interrupted briefly for a check on Lorenzo Pellegrini, who is down injured.
Roma's Lorenzo Pellegrini looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Roma at Stadio Friuli.
Throw-in Udinese.
Bryan Cristante (Roma) has replaced the possibly injured Lorenzo Pellegrini.
In the minute 83, Justin Kluivert is replacing Pedro for the away team.
Rosario Abisso awards the home team a throw-in.
Ilija Nestorovski is replacing Roberto Pereyra for Udinese at Stadio Friuli.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
In the minute 87, Luca Gotti is making the team's fourth substitution at Stadio Friuli with Mamadou Coulibaly replacing Rodrigo Becao.
Rosario Abisso signals a Roma throw-in in Udinese's half.
Throw-in for Udinese in their own half.
Rosario Abisso signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Udine.
Roma to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
Throw-in for Udinese close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Udine.
Throw-in for Roma close to the penalty box.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
Paulo Fonseca is making the team's fourth substitution at Stadio Friuli with Gonzalo Villar replacing Edin Dzeko.
